title: TurboScan document scanner v1.2.6 apk.apk
description:
TurboScan turns your phone into a multipage scanner for documents, receipts, notes, whiteboards, and other text. With TurboScan, you can quickly scan your documents and store or email them as multipage PDF or JPEG files.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Featured in New York Times (Jan 2012), CNN Money (Sept 2012), The Telegraph (Jan 2015).
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Ã¢â‚¬Å“If you're not using TurboScan for your document scanning, you're doing it wrongÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Engadget.com (TUAW, 2014)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ "Unbelievably sharp. The best app IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve tried... The scan accuracy of SureScan mode is brilliant" - AppBank (April 2010)

TurboScan uses advanced fast algorithms to auto-detect document edges, straighten the documents (correct perspective), eliminate shadows and set a perfect contrast.

TurboScan boasts a powerful yet easy to use interface. Get instant one-tap brightness, rotation and color controls all on one screen!

TurboScan also offers SureScan, our proprietary scanning mode for sharper scans (especially useful in low-light conditions.) SureScan requires taking three pictures of the same document with the phone camera.

TurboScan's handy "Email to myself" feature lets you send documents to a predefined address, or even upload them to online storage sites like Evernote, with a single tap.

All processing happens on your phone, and the confidentiality of your data is never compromised (no Internet connection needed.)

TURBOSCAN FEATURES:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Automatic document edge detection and perspective correction
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ SureScan mode for very sharp scans
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Ultra-fast processing (under 3 seconds per page)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Document naming, storage inside the app and search
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Multipage editing: add, reorder, and delete pages
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Copy pages between stored scans
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Ã¢â‚¬Å“Email to myselfÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ feature for quick emails
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Email document as PDF, JPEG or PNG, or save to camera roll
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Arrange multiple receipts or business cards on a PDF page
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Open PDFs or JPEGs in other apps like the free Dropbox app (or Evernote, SkyDrive, GoogleDrive app, etc) to send to clouds, or fax apps
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Printing via Cloud Print or other print apps
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Instant one-tap brightness, rotation, and color controls
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Compact attachments with adjustable size

TIPS ON SCANNING
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Make sure your document is flat and well lit.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ For best edge detection, include some margin around your document while shooting.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use flash in low light conditions, but avoid glare from it with glossy documents.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ If your flash over-saturates images or makes them blurry, please change the flash option in app Settings
